meanings.definition: Having sore or painful feet from walking or standing for a long time.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, my feet were so footsore that I could barely walk.
meanings.sent2: She felt footsore after standing all day at the concert.
meanings.sent3: His footsore feet made him regret not wearing more comfortable shoes.
meanings.sent4: The footsore marathon runner pushed through the pain to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The footsore traveler finally sat down to rest after a day of exploring the city.

meanings.definition: Feeling discomfort or pain in the feet from fatigue or injury.
meanings.sent1: The footsore hiker decided to take a break and rest his aching feet.
meanings.sent2: She was footsore from wearing tight shoes that rubbed against her skin.
meanings.sent3: Despite being footsore, he managed to dance at the party all night.
meanings.sent4: The footsore athlete applied ice to his swollen feet after the game.
meanings.sent5: Her footsore toes cried out for relief after a day of wearing high heels.
